public ref class FilePlanReport sealed : IDisposable, Microsoft::Office::RecordsManagement::Reporting::IReportDataSource

Docs.summary: Represents a data source for gathering audit history data.

remarks.para: This data source contains the following types of rows of data: An inital row of metadata about the list or document library, a summary row for each content type, a row for the details of each folder, and a row for the details of each retention schedule.
